cause.description:
Stop the senseless killing of innocent civilians in the illegal occupation of Iraq. Immediately
Since the illegal occupation of Iraq millions have attempted to bring our troops home, but right now is the time, we must join together and act together to achieve our common goal.
PLEASE: Don't advertise for your own cause on the wall, whether it has something to do with this or not, and any use of racism or bashing another member you're comment will be deleted and you may be banned from the cause.
1. US Must Immediatly Pull All Troops Out of Iraq
cause.mission: Pull US Troops Out of Iraq.
cause.name: US OUT OF IRAQ
